name: Solobot 0.1(Downloadable version)
description:
This a downloadable version of the game , this is still prototype and is still under development, the game runs better on when its downloaded than being played online. there will be updates  and new versions of the game allowing you to gain access to better missions and more features , the game is a bit buggy . One of the screenshots are based on our newest versions that is still under development.

Good luck on the BOSS FIGHT!!!  I did not post a screenshot to spoil the game but I hope you enjoy it .

Warning!!! The default difficulty is on Hard/ Veteran mode for a third person  shooter.

If there's anything that you'd like us to add in the game please let us know in the comments below , your feedback would really help on this .
